Data precision bits.

final int gridripper::io::BDataFlags::FIELD_PREC_FLOAT = 256 [static]

Field components are stored in floats.

final int gridripper::io::BDataFlags::FIELD_PREC_DOUBLE = 0 [static]

Field components are stored in doubles.

final int gridripper::io::BDataFlags::SKIP_KX = 1024 [static]

Do _not_ store the kx array.

The kx array is an array of valid grid point indices, used for storing AMR grids. It is superfluous in case of a regular grid.
